title: Graphic & Web Design Intern
longSummary: Worked on WordPress client sites, creating responsive templates and custom shortcodes to speed up content creation. Improved site load times and accessibility.
responsibilities: Implemented custom PHP shortcodes for reusable blocks
Optimized images and front-end assets for performance
Wrote documentation and tutorials for client editors

title: Web Design Chair
organization: Lambda Phi Epsilon International Fraternity, Inc.
longSummary: Led the redesign of the chapter website to improve recruitment flow and highlight events; coordinated with chapter members to gather content.
responsibilities: Coordinated content and assets with chapter members
Deployed responsive templates and hosted updates

title: Web Designer
longSummary: Designed and implemented a responsive website to showcase products and events, improving online discoverability and simplifying order/booking flows. Focused on clear visual hierarchy and performance optimizations for faster load times on mobile devices.
responsibilities: Designed page layouts and responsive components
Built accessible HTML/CSS pages and interactive UI with vanilla JavaScript
Optimized images and assets for performance
Worked with owners to iterate on content and calls-to-action

title: Graphic Designer
longSummary: Produced branding and promotional artwork for product launches and events, including packaging mockups, social graphics, and print collateral. Collaborated with the marketing lead to ensure consistent brand language across channels.
responsibilities: Created brand assets and packaging mockups
Designed promotional materials for events and social media
Prepared print-ready files and coordinated with vendors
